summary: REQ-7 and REQ-8 appear implemented via an updated Closing CTA X link and a new Flubby Gallery landing-page section rendering 6 static image references with captions and responsive grid layout. REQ-9 is only partially evidenced: the code references the required filenames under /assets/generated with English alt text, but the diff summary does not show the required image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: All required new gallery images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated (or the projectâ€™s established generated-assets location).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only a new React component referencing the image paths, but does not show any new PNG assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (or any public assets directory).
